10:07 <Pbas> Hi folks, I don't knows if someone already ask but with xwiki last version, can I limit the number of sublevel of nested page? ie if i want one level limit like previous xwiki version (1 space and pages)? any parameters for this feature?  
10:18 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:18 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:21 <vmassol> Pbas: not now. I think there's an open jira for this from Anca  
10:21 <vmassol> what's the use case?  
10:22 <vmassol> I can think of http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13402 but it's not strictly related to this  
10:28 <Pbas> the use case: I want forbidden subdirectory creation  
10:28 <Pbas> "I" is my boss :-)  
10:29 <vmassol> that's not a use case  
10:29 <Pbas> or simply limit subdirectoy deeph  
10:29 <vmassol> what's the use case? (ie what's the rationale)  
10:29 <vmassol> that's just the consequence  
10:29 <vmassol> why is your boss not saying this for this filesystem for example?  
10:30 <vmassol> s/this/his  
10:30 <vmassol> he's probably on windows and employees can create subdirectories no?  
10:30 <Pbas> we use a space like an encyclopedy and he wxant all page in ths space without sublevel  
10:30 <vmassol> ok so it's only for a specific space  
10:30 <vmassol> not for the whole wiki  
10:31 <Pbas> yes :-)  
10:31 <vmassol> well easy  
10:31 <vmassol> just create terminal pages  
10:31 <Pbas> thinking (I didn't chack acl)  
10:31 <vmassol> encyclopedia pages should be created as terminal  
10:31 <vmassol> so they cannot have children  
10:31 <Pbas> wow is it so simple?  
10:31 <vmassol> and offer a form to create new encyclopedia pages  
10:32 <vmassol> so that it's set to terminal by default when users create those pages  
10:32 <vmassol> it's not perfect  
10:32 <vmassol> but it's a workaround for your needs  
10:32 <vmassol> don't know if it's good enough, you tell me :)  
10:33 <Pbas> ok thxs it is a way  
10:33 <vmassol> in any case it won't hurt to create a jira issue improvement, it's just not there now and I don't know when someone will have time to work on this  
10:34 <Pbas> Then there aren't a deeph nested parameter?  
10:34 <Pbas> Ok I could  
10:34 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
10:35 <Pbas> because I'm thinking if users creating too much sub level , it will be a mess after year (maybe)  
10:36 <Pbas> (like filesytem on some Samba shared)  
10:36 <Pbas> on some Samba network share pardon  
10:42 <vmassol> "Then there aren't a deeph nested parameter?" no there isn't  
10:42 <vmassol> I don't see why it would be more a mess than being flat....  
10:42 <vmassol> having 100000 docs in the same space or in various spaces is the same mess IMO :)  
10:42 <vmassol> (actually more messy in a flat structure I think)  
10:43 <vmassol> a wiki needs gardening anyway  
10:43 <Pbas> for sure :-D  
10:43 <vmassol> (like any collaboration system)  
10:44 <vmassol> so if you want a limit on number of spaces you should also want a limit on number of documents in a given space IMO. But I'm not sure it's a good idea  
10:44 <Pbas> but il is better to avoid mess problem instead fix it by gardenner  
10:44 <vmassol> unless there are other reasons that we haven't listed yet for limiting the hierarchy size  
10:44 <vmassol> Pbas: so you don't agree that a flat structure is as messy?  
10:45 <Pbas> ... depending of use case  
10:45 <vmassol> let me say one thing  
10:45 <vmassol> the original goal of a wiki is to be messy  
10:45 <vmassol> in order to provide serendipity  
10:46 <vmassol> now XWiki has a solution for this  
10:46 <vmassol> 1) allows some part of the wiki to be "messy" (ie free structure)  
10:46 <vmassol> 2) allow other part to be controlled with structure apps  
10:46 <vmassol> \*structured  
10:46 <vmassol> so if you want order in the encyclopedia part you need to build a small app for that  
10:47 <vmassol> and then you'll control the organizational structure  
10:47 <vmassol> (since it's the app that creates the pages and decides where to put them and it also control the content since it provides a structure)  
10:48 <vmassol> that's the beauty of XWiki :)  
10:48 <vmassol> you can have both  
10:48 <Pbas> yes I agree about wiki spirit , but the shame, everyone didn't have write access (on intranet)  big boss decision :-/  
10:50 <Pbas> Ok I understand than limiting depth of nested page would be a regression :-)  
10:50 <vmassol> Pbas: btw are you on XWiki 7.4+ ?  
10:50 <vmassol> (or still on 6.x)  
10:51 <Pbas> nope 7.0.1 and I must upgrade it to 8.2.1  
10:51 <vmassol> ok  
10:52 <Pbas> It will be second upgrade since 6.x version  
10:53 <Pbas> ty to show me the light of serendipity (I didn't know this word) ;-)
